text.en: Victorious ones dwelling in the ten directions and four times,
text.en-trans: chok chu dü zhir zhukpé gyalwa dang

text.en: Their bodhisattva heirs and śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha arhats—
text.en-trans: dé sé changsem nyen rang drachom sok

text.en: Noble assembly with your eyes of wisdom,
text.en-trans: pakpé tsok nam yeshe chen denpé

text.en: Bear witness to the fulfilment of this pure prayer of aspiration.
text.en-trans: namdak mönlam drubpé pangpo dzö

text.en: Through all the excellent deeds of past, present and future,
text.en-trans: shakya sengé sung rab pungpo lé

text.en: Represented by the sources of virtue created here
text.en-trans: tra tsé shé tsam gangchen jong diru

text.en: Through the gathering as a collection
text.en-trans: chögyal lo pen nam kyi gyurwa dang

text.en: Of a mere portion of the Śākya lion's teachings,
text.en-trans: ka yi duwa chenpö lekbam nam

text.en: Which are present here in this Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: dengdir düpé tsok kyi drukpa yi

text.en: Having been translated by dharma-kings, lotsāwas and paṇḍitas,
text.en-trans: gewé tsawa jinyé chipa dé

text.en: And compiled in these great volumes of the Word—
text.en-trans: tsönpé dü sum lek jé jinyepa

text.en: I dedicate all as a cause for the flourishing of the teachings.
text.en-trans: kün kyang tenpa gyepé gyu ru ngo

text.en: In particular, may all the ‘children of the sun’ who harm the teachings1
text.en-trans: khyepar ten la tsewé nyi bü tsok

text.en: Be swiftly pacified and may the whole world enjoy happiness and well-being.
text.en-trans: nyurdu zhi né jikten dé zhing kyi

text.en: May all those sentient beings who have a connection with me
text.en-trans: dak la drelwa tokpé semchen nam

text.en: Purify all past karma, mental afflictions, and suffering.
text.en-trans: lé nyön dukngal malü jangwar shok

text.en: May all benefactors, male and female, who have perished in conflict
text.en-trans: yulngor shiwé jindak pomo nam

text.en: Pacify all forms of suffering and deluded perception,
text.en-trans: trulnang dukngal malü kün zhi né

text.en: And gain an excellent form as a god or human being in the higher realms.
text.en-trans: ngön to lhami ten zang tobpar shok

text.en: May all those who have taken refuge in me
text.en-trans: dak la kyab su nyenpa tamché kyang

text.en: Overcome all adversity and enjoy increased longevity, merit, glory and wealth.
text.en-trans: galkyen kün zhi tsé sö paljor gyé

text.en: May all that they do in thought and deed be successful
text.en-trans: samjor tamché yizhin drubpa dang

text.en: And may they perfectly accumulate great stores of merit.
text.en-trans: sönam tsokchen yongsu dzokpar shok

text.en: May we pacify all illness, malevolent influences and harm.
text.en-trans: dakchak nedön nöpa kün zhi zhing

text.en: May all threats of scandal, sorcery, spirits and astrological influence
text.en-trans: zukchen zukmé mikha jepur dang

text.en: From beings with form and those without form be overcome,
text.en-trans: si kek lasok nyertsé mitsuk shing

text.en: And may everyone remain under the protection of the Three Jewels.
text.en-trans: könchok sum gyi kyab ok tsüpar shok

text.en: In all our lives may we encounter the sacred Dharma,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu dampé chö dang tré

text.en: And always meet authentic spiritual teachers who can guide us.
text.en-trans: tön jé yangdak geweshé dang jal

text.en: May we perfectly accumulate the components of ethical discipline
text.en-trans: tsultrim pungpo yongsu dzokpa dang

text.en: And act to serve the teachings of the Victorious One.
text.en-trans: gyalwé ten la jawa jepar shok

text.en: May the precious teachings pervade throughout the world.
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen dzamling küntu khyab

text.en: May the great beings who uphold these teachings live long.
text.en-trans: tendzin kyé nam zhabpé tenpa dang

text.en: May those who are hostile towards the teachings be overcome like grass in a wildfire,
text.en-trans: ten la dangwa tsa bur mé sek zhin

text.en: And may all be auspicious for the teachings to spread throughout the ten directions.
text.en-trans: tenpa chok chur gyepé tashi shok
